3. Sum up all the scores for all 6,000 turns.

Total Score = Sum of (Highest Number Rolled * Number of Times Rolled) for all 6,000 turns

Total Score = (6*1 + 5*1 + 5*1 + 6*1 + 6*1 + 6*1 + ... + 6*1)

Total Score = 6,000 * 6 = 36,000
